content:
Adding a **Next Steps** column will help you break down the follow-up process into actionable tasks, making it easier to manage and stay on top of your networking efforts.

**Updated People Met sheet:**

| Name | Title/Company | Contact Info | Conversation Notes | Follow-up Action | Follow-up Deadline | Follow-up Status | Next Steps | Industry/Sector | Event |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| Rachel | [unknown] Google | [rachel.google.com](mailto:rachel.google.com) | Discussed intent-based marketing | Send follow-up email | 2023-02-24 | Pending | Draft email, research relevant articles to share | Technology > Internet | Marketing Conference at Hilton Hotel |

The **Next Steps** column can include specific tasks, such as:

* Drafting an email or message
* Researching relevant articles or resources to share
* Scheduling a call or meeting
* Preparing a proposal or pitch
* Sending a reminder or follow-up email

By breaking down the follow-up process into smaller, manageable tasks, you'll be able to:

1. Focus on one task at a time, reducing overwhelm and increasing productivity.
2. Ensure that you're taking consistent and deliberate actions to nurture your network.
3. Track your progress and stay motivated as you complete each next step.
4. Adapt to changes or new information that may arise during the follow-up process.

**Tips for using the Next Steps column:**

1. Be specific: Break down larger tasks into smaller, actionable steps to ensure clarity and focus.
2. Prioritize: Identify the most critical next steps and tackle them first to maximize impact.
3. Update regularly: As you complete next steps, update the column to reflect the new tasks or actions required.
4. Leverage templates: Consider creating email or message templates to streamline your follow-up process and save time.
5. Review and adjust: Regularly review your next steps to ensure they're still relevant and effective, and make adjustments as needed.

By incorporating the Next Steps column, you'll be able to transform your follow-up process into a systematic, results-driven approach that drives meaningful connections and opportunities!
